mapper.update: update b_reserve_scale set scaleid=scaleid ,scaleyear=#{scaleyear} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,scalevalue=#{scalevalue} ,belongto=#{belongto} where scaleid=#{scaleid}

update b_reserve_scale set scaleid=scaleid ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,scaleyear=#{scaleyear} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,scalevalue=#{scalevalue} ,belongto=#{belongto} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,updateuserid=#{updateuserid} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} where 1=1 and scaleid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and scaleid =#{Where_Id} and scaleid=#{Where_scaleid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and scaleyear=#{Where_scaleyear} and grainattrid=#{Where_grainattrid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and scalevalue=#{Where_scalevalue} and belongto=#{Where_belongto} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and updateuserid=#{Where_updateuserid} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime}
mapper.select: select t.scaleid "scaleid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.scaleyear "scaleyear", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.grainid "grainid", t.scalevalue "scalevalue", t.belongto "belongto", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", lg.grainname "grainname", lgr.grainattrname "grainattrname", lc.companyname "companyname", lgp.groupname "groupname", lgd.graindepotname "graindepotname" from b_reserve_scale t left join l_grain lg on lg.grainid=t.grainid left join l_grainattr lgr on lgr.grainattrid=t.grainattrid left join l_company lc on lc.companyid=t.companyid left join l_group lgp on lgp.groupid=t.groupid left join l_graindepot lgd on lgd.graindepotid=t.graindepotid where scaleid=#{scaleid}

select t.scaleid "scaleid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.scaleyear "scaleyear", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.grainid "grainid", t.scalevalue "scalevalue", t.belongto "belongto", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime" from b_reserve_scale t where 1=1 and t.scaleid=#{scaleid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.scaleyear=#{scaleyear} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.scalevalue=#{scalevalue} and t.belongto=#{belongto} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime}

select t.scaleid "scaleid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.scaleyear "scaleyear", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.grainid "grainid", t.scalevalue "scalevalue", t.belongto "belongto", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime" from b_reserve_scale t where 1=1 and t.scaleid=#{scaleid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.scaleyear=#{scaleyear} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.scalevalue=#{scalevalue} and t.belongto=#{belongto} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime}
mapper.delete: delete from b_reserve_scale where 1=1 and scaleid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and scaleid =#{Where_Id} and scaleid=#{Where_scaleid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and scaleyear=#{Where_scaleyear} and grainattrid=#{Where_grainattrid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and scalevalue=#{Where_scalevalue} and belongto=#{Where_belongto} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and updateuserid=#{Where_updateuserid} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime}
mapper.select: select t.scaleid "scaleid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.scaleyear "scaleyear", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.grainid "grainid", t.scalevalue "scalevalue", t.belongto "belongto", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", lg.grainname "grainname", lgr.grainattrname "grainattrname" from b_reserve_scale t left join l_grain lg on lg.grainid=t.grainid left join l_grainattr lgr on lgr.grainattrid=t.grainattrid where 1=1 and t.scaleid=#{scaleid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.scaleyear=#{scaleyear} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.scalevalue=#{scalevalue} and t.belongto=#{belongto} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime}

select count(*) from b_reserve_scale t where 1=1 and t.scaleid=#{scaleid} and t.scaleid!=#{NoId} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.scaleyear=#{scaleyear} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.scalevalue=#{scalevalue} and t.belongto=#{belongto} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime}
